nodes.text: ID tags were used by the crew of a mining platform controlled by Nilya Fek'ra on the planet Cotellier. All personnel, including children and visitors, were required to wear and display the ID tags at all times. They were used to regulate the personnel of the platform by granting or restricting access to certain area based on their tag.
A name tag was a form of identification found among Imperial miners on Mimban. It proved citizenship within the five mine towns.
